{{cpp/numeric/valarray/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=valarray|1=
template&lt; class T &gt;
valarray&lt;T&gt; cos( const valarray&lt;T&gt;&amp; va );
}}

对 {{c|va}} 中每个元素计算元素值的余弦。

===参数===
{{par begin}}
{{par|va|要应用操作到的值数组}}
{{par end}}

===返回值===
含有 {{c|va}} 中各值的余弦的值数组。

===注解===
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/notes unq|cos}}

{{cpp/numeric/valarray/notes ret|cos}}

===可能的实现===
{{cpp/numeric/valarray/impl|cos}}

===示例===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;cmath&gt;
#include &lt;iomanip&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
#include &lt;valarray&gt;

void show(const char* title, const std::valarray&lt;float&gt;&amp; data)
{
    const int w{9};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::setw(w) &lt;&lt; title &lt;&lt; " {{!}} ";
    for (float x : data)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; std::setw(w) &lt;&lt; x &lt;&lt; " {{!}} ";
    std::cout &lt;&lt; '\n';
}

int main()
{
    const std::valarray&lt;float&gt; x{.1, .2, .3, .4};
    const auto sin = std::sin(x);
    const auto cos = std::cos(x);
    const auto z = (sin * sin) + (cos * cos);

    show("x", x);
    show("sin(x)", sin);
    show("cos(x)", cos);
    show("z", z);
}
|output=&lt;nowiki/&gt;
        x {{!}}       0.1 {{!}}       0.2 {{!}}       0.3 {{!}}       0.4 {{!}} 
   sin(x) {{!}} 0.0998334 {{!}}  0.198669 {{!}}   0.29552 {{!}}  0.389418 {{!}} 
   cos(x) {{!}}  0.995004 {{!}}  0.980067 {{!}}  0.955337 {{!}}  0.921061 {{!}} 
        z {{!}}         1 {{!}}         1 {{!}}         1 {{!}}         1 {{!}} 
}}
